metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6318 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the FascistGecosUser function inlib/fascist.c in cracklib allows local users to cause a denial of service(application crash) or gain privileges via a long GECOS field, involvinglongbuffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6318` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cracklib-runtime - 2.9.2-3
libcrack2 - 2.9.2-3
python-cracklib - 2.9.2-3
python3-cracklib - 2.9.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cracklib2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.2-3').
